data.text: Best experience of my life, by the way.

data.text: out there in every single way.

translation.text: ra khỏi đó theo mọi cách

data.text: -Harry left me the plans for his next job.

translation.text: -Harry để lại cho tôi các kế hoạch cho công việc tiếp theo của mình.

data.text: It's worth $5 million.

translation.text: Nó trị giá 5 triệu đô la.

data.text: -You want us to -- -Pull off the job, yeah.

data.text: that can make you that kind of money,

title: Viola Davis Failed a 28-Day Cleanse in Two Days in a Spectacular Way
